genresAdvancedInfo.name: israeli traditional
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Israeli traditional music is a genre that encompasses a variety of styles and sounds that have been passed down through generations. It is rooted in Jewish and Middle Eastern musical traditions and often includes instruments such as the oud, darbuka, and violin. The music is often characterized by its complex rhythms, intricate melodies, and emotional depth.
